data.name: AndMustFollowNormalStep
data.value: An 'And' statement must be preceded by a 'Given', 'When' or 'Then'.

data.name: ArgumentHasNotBeenClosed
data.value: Quoted argument has not been closed.

data.name: ArgumentTypeNotCompatible
data.value: Cannot use a value of type {0} for an argument declared as a {1}.

data.name: BadOptionFormat
data.value: Bad option format. Option must the format '$optionName', optionally with a value separated by ':', e.g. '$optionName:value'.

data.name: BadTagFormat
data.value: Bad tag format. Tag must have the format '@tagName'.

data.name: CannotSpecifyDynamicValueInStepDefinition
data.value: You cannot use '{0}' as a Step Parameter. Step Parameter variables must be literal names, e.g. 'variable1' or 'total'. You cannot specify dynamic values.

data.name: DuplicateScenarioNames
data.value: This scenario name, '{0}', has already been used in this feature. Scenario names must be unique within a feature.

data.name: ExamplesBlockRequiresTable
data.value: Examples blocks must contain a table.

data.name: ExampleVariableInScenario
data.value: You have specified an Example variable to insert, '{0}', but the step is in a Scenario; did you mean to use a Scenario Outline instead?

data.name: ExampleVariableNotDeclared
data.value: You have specified an Example variable to insert, '{0}', but you have not declared the variable in any of your Examples. This value will always be blank when the test runs.

data.name: InteractionComponentInheritanceLoop
data.value: Detected a circular component inheritance loop; loop path is {0}.

data.name: InteractionComponentInheritedComponentNotFound
data.value: The specified component to inherit from, {0}, cannot be found. Does this component exist?

data.name: InteractionComponentStepDefinitionCannotHaveComponentMarker
data.value: Interaction Step Definitions inside components cannot have $component$ markers; these are reserved for Trait steps.

data.name: InteractionConstantNotDefined
data.value: The {0} constant is not defined.

data.name: InteractionDuplicateTrait
data.value: Duplicate trait specified.

data.name: InteractionInvalidContent
data.value: Invalid character(s).

data.name: InteractionMethodArgumentMismatch
data.value: The method being called requires {0} argument(s), but you are only providing {1}.

data.name: InteractionMethodCallMissingParameterSeparator
data.value: Method call appears to be missing a parameter separator, are you missing a comma?

data.name: InteractionMethodCallMissingSeparator
data.value: Missing call separator '->'.

data.name: InteractionMethodCallUnterminated
data.value: Method call has not been closed, expecting ')'.

data.name: InteractionMethodCircularReference
data.value: An interaction method cannot call itself.

data.name: InteractionMethodDeclMissingParameter
data.value: Method declaration expects another parameter; do you have an unintended extra comma in your declaration list?

data.name: InteractionMethodDeclMissingParameterSeparator
data.value: Method declaration appears to be missing a parameter separator, are you missing a comma?

data.name: InteractionMethodDeclUnexpectedContent
data.value: Method declaration contains unexpected content. Method declarations should consist of zero or more parameter names only, e.g. method(), method(param1), method(param1, param2).

data.name: InteractionMethodDeclUnterminated
data.value: Method declaration has not been closed, expecting ')'.

data.name: InteractionMethodFromTraitRequiredButNotDefined
data.value: Component is missing definition for required method '{0}', declared in {1}:{2}.

data.name: InteractionMethodNeedsParentheses
data.value: Interaction methods require parentheses; e.g. myMethod(), or myMethod(arg1, arg2).

data.name: InteractionMethodNotAvailable
data.value: The specified interaction method '{0}' is not available. It must be declared with an associated expression, e.g. '{0}: method()'.

data.name: InteractionMethodNotAvailablePermitUndefined
data.value: The specified interaction method '{0}' is not available. It should be either be declared with an associated expression, or with 'needs-defining'. E.g. '{0}: method()' or '{0}: needs-defining'.

data.name: InteractionMethodRequiredButNotDefined
data.value: Method needs to be defined; declared at {0}:L{1}.

data.name: InteractionMissingExpectedName
data.value: A name is required.

data.name: InteractionMissingStepDeclaration
data.value: Interaction Step Declaration is missing the declaration text.

data.name: InteractionNameAlreadySet
data.value: A name has already been provided for this entity.

data.name: InteractionTraitStepDefinitionMustHaveComponent
data.value: Interaction Step Definitions inside traits must contain at least one $component$ marker, so that the component can be identified.

data.name: InteractionUnterminatedString
data.value: Unterminated string.

data.name: InteractionVariableNotAnArray
data.value: The {0} variable is not a collection, so you cannot access it as one.

data.name: InteractionVariableNotDefined
data.value: The {0} variable is not defined.

data.name: InvalidExamplesKeyword
data.value: The 'Examples' keyword is case-sensitive, so '{0}' should be 'Examples:'

data.name: InvalidFeatureKeyword
data.value: The 'Feature' keyword is case-sensitive, so '{0}' should be 'Feature:'

data.name: InvalidScenarioKeyword
data.value: The 'Scenario' keyword is case-sensitive, so '{0}' should be 'Scenario:'

data.name: InvalidScenarioOutlineKeyword
data.value: The 'Scenario Outline' phrase is case-sensitive, so '{0}' should be 'Scenario Outline:'

data.name: InvalidStepDefineKeyword
data.value: A custom step cannot be defined using '{0}'. You must use Given, When or Then.

data.name: IOException
data.value: File access error: {0}

data.name: LinkerMultipleMatchingDefinitions
data.value: There are multiple matching step definitions that match this step.

data.name: LinkerNoMatchingStepDefinition
data.value: No step definitions could be found that match this step.

data.name: NoFeatureTitleProvided
data.value: Features must have a title.

data.name: NoScenarioOutlineTitleProvided
data.value: Scenario Outlines must have a title.

data.name: NoScenarios
data.value: Your Feature '{0}' has no Scenarios, so will not run any tests.

data.name: NoScenarioTitleProvided
data.value: Scenarios must have a title.

data.name: NotExpectingExample
data.value: Not expecting an Examples block here; did you mean to define '{0}' as a Scenario Outline rather than a Scenario?

data.name: OnlyOneFeatureAllowed
data.value: You can only have one Feature per file. Create a new file for this Feature.

data.name: OptionWithNoSetting
data.value: Provided Option '{0}' has a setting value marker ':', but no value has been provided.

data.name: StepNotExpected
data.value: A Step is not expected here.

data.name: StepVariableInvalidWhitespace
data.value: Extraneous whitespace detected in Step Parameter variable name. You cannot have extra whitespace at the start or end of a Step Parameter variable name.

data.name: StepVariableNameRequired
data.value: You cannot specify an Empty Parameter as a Step Parameter. Step Parameter variables must be literal names, e.g. {variable1} or {total}.

data.name: StepVariableNotDeclared
data.value: You have specified a Step parameter variable to insert, '{0}', but you have not declared the variable in the step declaration. This value will always be blank when the test runs.

data.name: SyntaxError
data.value: Syntax Error: {0}

data.name: TableColumnsMismatch
data.value: The row contains {0} cell(s), but we are expecting {1}, because of the number of headers.

data.name: TableRowHasNotBeenTerminated
data.value: Table cell has not been terminated. Expecting a table delimiter character '|'.

data.name: TypeRequiresValueForArgument
data.value: The step definition requires a type of {0} for this argument, but no value has been provided.

data.name: UncategorisedException
data.value: Internal Error: {0}

data.name: UnexpectedAnnotation
data.value: Not expecting an annotation at this position.

data.name: UnexpectedEndOfFile
data.value: Unexpected end of file.
